mailTemplateDef.mailBody:
<#assign bgcolorCellNormal = "#edf0f6"> <#assign bgcolorCellChanged = "#ffaa9f"> <#-- render the short fields --> <#macro renderShortFields fieldChangeRows> <#list fieldChangeRows as fieldChange> ${fieldChange.localizedFieldLabel}: <#-- if copy we are not interested in the change compared to the original workItem --> <#assign dispOldValue = ""> <#if !fieldChange.changed || isCopy> <#assign bgcolor=bgcolorCellNormal> <#else> <#assign bgcolor=bgcolorCellChanged> <#assign dispOldValue = fieldChange.oldShowValue> ${fieldChange.newShowValue} ${dispOldValue} <#-- render the long fields (description, comment, ... ) --> <#macro renderLongFields fieldChangeRows> <#list fieldChangeRows as fieldChange>

${fieldChange.localizedChangeDetail}:
${fieldChange.newShowValue}

${changeDetail}
Project: ${project} - ${itemNo}
<#if isCreated || isCopy> Created by: ${createdBy} <#if isCopy>
Copied from issue ${oldIssue} <#else> Modified by: ${changedBy}

<@renderShortFields shortFieldChanges/>
Field New Values Old Values
<@renderLongFields longFieldChanges/>

For further information: ${moreInfo}

${fieldChange.localizedChangeDetail}
${fieldChange.newShowValue}

${changeDetail}

Kopiert aus dem Vorgang ${oldIssue} <#else> Ge√§ndert von: ${changedBy}

<@renderShortFields shortFieldChanges/>
